description: This file sets up a knowledge base and an agent for processing queries related to a PDF document containing Thai recipes, using various AI and database components.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base class that loads PDF content from URLs and integrates with a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent that interacts with the knowledge base and processes user queries.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: A language model class representing the Claude model from Anthropic.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database class interfacing with PostgreSQL using pgvector.

classes.name: AzureOpenAIEmbedder
classes.description: An embedder class that uses Azure OpenAI services for embedding text.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response to a user query, formatted in markdown.
